package me.agno.gridjavacore

  • Class
    Description
    Grid<T>
    Represents a grid that displays and manages a collection of items of type T.
    IGrid<T>
    Interface representing a grid that displays data based on a given query and provides filtering, sorting, searching, and pagination functionality.
    IGridColumnCollection<T>
    Represents a collection of grid columns for a specific grid.
    IGridOptions
    The IGridOptions interface represents the options available for a grid.
    IGridSettingsProvider
    The interface IGridSettingsProvider defines the methods for retrieving the sort, filter, and search settings for a grid.
    QueryStringGridSettingsProvider
    The QueryStringGridSettingsProvider class is an implementation of the IGridSettingsProvider interface.
    SearchOptions
    The SearchOptions class represents the search options for a grid.
    SelectItem
    The SelectItem class represents an item in a select list.
